mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PAGE_SET ( F_PAGE_SET_ID, F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_PAGE_SET_NAME, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ pageSetId }, #{ ownerProjectId }, #{ pageSetName }, #{ title }, #{ description }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PAGE_SET SET F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }, F_PAGE_SET_NAME = #{ pageSetName }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_PAGE_SET_ID = #{ pageSetId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_PAGE_SET_ID AS "pageSetId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_PAGE_SET_NAME AS "pageSetName", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_PAGE_SET_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_PAGE_SET T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_PAGE_SET_ID = #{ pageSetId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_PAGE_SET T1
